DOC.brief_title: Risk Pulmonary Venous Thromboembolism Pregnancies After Vitro Fertilization
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Occurrence venous thromboembolism ( VTE ) IVF pregnancy report numerous case report two small consecutive series . The incidence VTE IVF claim comparable incidence VTE normal pregnancy . No information exist concern pulmonary embolism ( PE ) . Aim : The aim estimate compare risk PE VTE trimester pregnancy IVF age period match control woman . Design method : A cross-sectional study use linkage Swedish population health register . The Swedish National Patient Register encompass inpatient outpatient . Inpatient data Sweden available nationwide since 1987 . Outpatient diagnosis hospital start collected 1997 . Data Patient Register link Swedish Medical Birth Register ( MBR ) National Board Health Welfare unique personal identity number assign Swedish resident , Exposed woman : Mothers give birth child result IVF retrieve Swedish IVF Register National Board Health Welfare . The Swedish IVF Register part Swedish Medical Birth Register ( MBR ) National Board Health Welfare include information IVF pregnancy since 1982 . We restrict retrieval mother child born 1990 2008 first child bear assist reproduction IVF . Unexposed woman : Each IVF woman match 5 unexposed woman MBR calendar year delivery maternal age . Information retrieve country birth , pre-pregnancy body mass index , family situation , cigarette smoking habit , number old sibling , singleton/multiple birth , estimate length gestation MBR register . Dates trimester calculate length gestation . Women´s education find Register Education , Statistics Sweden , linkage personal identity number . Diagnoses VTE include PE find linkage Swedish Patient Register National Board Health Welfare . This register comprise date admission discharge , main diagnosis seven contributing diagnosis . Diagnoses record accord International Classification Diagnoses ( ICD ) , ninth version prior 1996 tenth version 1997 . Codes use 415B , 451B , 452 , 453C-D , 453W , 453X , 673C , 671D-E , 671F ICD9 I260 , I269 , I801- 3 , I808-9 , I822-3 , I828-9 , O223 , O225 , O871 , O873 , O879 , O882 ICD10 . The study approve Research Ethics Committee Karolinska Institutet , Stockholm , Sweden ( Dnr 2010/267-31/4 ) .
DOC.criteria: Exposed woman : All mother give birth child result IVF retrieve Swedish Medical Birth Register ( MBR ) National Board Health Welfare . Unexposed woman : Each IVF woman match 5 unexposed woman MBR calendar year delivery ±2 year maternal age ±1 year .
